bind.jr:constraintMsg: Please enter the full name, First name and surname should start with a capital letter and there should be a space between them.
Please enter the full name, First name and surname should start with a capital letter and there should be a space between them.

input.hint: Should be negative and have 5-6 decimal places (i.e. -12.12345). On a Samsung Tab press the ".-"button twice for the "-" character.

select1.hint: If site is in poor condition and pasture growth was limited by the season, look for preferred and semi-palatable species growing in protected or favoured areas and determine level of utilisation.
